first_para: David Elliott Drew (born 13 April 1952) is a British Labour Co-operative politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Stroud from 1997 to 2010. He has been chosen as the Labour Co-operative candidate for Stroud at the next general election.

full.extract: David Elliott Drew (born 13 April 1952) is a British Labour Co-operative politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Stroud from 1997 to 2010. He has been chosen as the Labour Co-operative candidate for Stroud at the next general election.
full.title: David Drew (politician)
